name: @moonlet/providers
description: Moonlet Wallet providers for all supported blockchains

scripts.dev:zilliqa: microbundle --name MoonletZilliqaProvider watch -i src/providers/zilliqa.ts -o zilliqa.js --no-pkg-main -f umd
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r src dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && npm run build:zilliqa

author: Tibi K. <tibi@moonlet.io>
